body_html: @nvcastet The idea is to keep it around unmodified as a backup to the new distributed and not remove it until enough people have moved to the latest version and confirmed it works for them. All development will go towards the new one. No exact timeline for this but could be as soon as the next minor release post 1.0 if we don't see severe bug reports.
